text: Rolling Stones Records was a British record label. It formed by formed by the Rolling Stones members: Mick Jagger, Keith Richards, Mick Taylor, Charlie Watts and Bill Wyman in 1970. Atlantic Records was the distributor for Rolling Stones Records.Brian Garrity; Ed Christman, 'Ahmet Ertegün 1923–2006', Billboard, Vol. 119, No. 1 (6 January 2007), p. 8 It closed in 1992 when the band signed with Virgin Records. ==Artists== * The Rolling Stones ==Discography== ===The Rolling Stones=== ;Studio albums # Sticky Fingers (1971) # Exile on Main St. (1972) # Goats Head Soup (1973) # It's Only Rock 'n Roll (1974) # Black and Blue (1976) # Some Girls (1978) # Emotional Rescue (1980) # Tattoo You (1981) # Undercover (1983) # Dirty Work (1986) # Steel Wheels (1989) # A Bigger Bang (2005) == References == Category:1970 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1992 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:British record labels
title: Rolling Stones Records
